description.name: Sales Dashboard
description.tagline: Detailed sales management dashboard for WHMCS.
description.long: The Sales Dashboard addon for WHMCS provides a comprehensive view of your sales data. It includes visual representations of sales trends, allows filtering by date and category, and offers in-depth reports to help you manage and analyze your sales performance effectively.
features: Visualize sales trends with interactive charts.
Filter sales data by date range and category.
Generate detailed reports on sales performance.
